content: {"name": "For Hosea Williams Feed the Hungry and Homeless", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The day center is closed from June 17 to July 7 \nCheck our site periodically because we make sure that any changes and new information is updated on our website\nClients can visit every 90 days", "email": "", "url": "https://4hosea.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2545 Forrest Hills Drive Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Perkerson", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30315", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6851572, "longitude": -84.4000595}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 755-3353", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
